au.com.addstar.monolith.command

Interface ICommand

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the command
        Returns:
        the name of the Command

      • getAliases

        String[] getAliases()
        Gets any aliases this command has
        Returns:
        an array of the aliases or null if there are none

      • getPermission

        String getPermission()
        Returns:
        Gets the permission that this command needs to be used, or null if there isnt one

      • getUsageString

        String getUsageString(String label,
                      org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Gets the usage string for this command. This should be in the format of: <command> <usage>
        Parameters:
        label - This is either the name of the command or an alias if they used one.
        sender - The sender of the command
        Returns:
        The usage string

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns:
        Gets the description of the command for the help system

      • getAllowedSenders

        EnumSet<CommandSenderType> getAllowedSenders()
        Returns:
        Gets what types of command senders are allowed

      • onCommand

        boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                  String parent,
                  String label,
                  String[] args)
           throws BadArgumentException
        Called when this command is executed. By this time the permission has been checked, and if this command does not accept the console as a sender, that wont trigger this command.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of this command. If canBeConsole() == false, this will only ever be an instance of a Player
        parent - The command name and path of the parent command.
        label - The command name or the alias that was used to call this command
        args - The arguments for this command
        Returns:
        True if this command was executed. False otherwise
        Throws:
        BadArgumentException

      • onTabComplete

        List<String> onTabComplete(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                           String parent,
                           String label,
                           String[] args)
        Called when tab complete is used on this command.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of the tab complete
        parent - The command name and path of the parent command.
        label - The command name or the alias that was used to specity this command
        args - The current arguments entered.
        Returns:
        A list of all results or null
